# Strategic Mandate: Tier 1 Complete Initiative

## Vision Alignment

This initiative directly advances our vision of creating a best-in-class user experience.

## Strategic Priority

High priority for Q1 2026.

## Resource Commitment

- Engineering: 2 FTE for 6 weeks
- Design: 0.5 FTE for 3 weeks
- Budget: $50,000

## Success Metrics

1. Increase user engagement by 20%
2. Reduce bounce rate by 15%

## Risks & Mitigations

| Risk | Mitigation |
|------|------------|
| Technical complexity | Phased rollout |
| User adoption | A/B testing |
